text.en: Inseparable from Padmākara, the face and embodiment of the Three Roots,
text.en-trans: tsa sum dü zhal guru pejung dang

text.en: And Longchenpa, the omniscient and perfectly awakened,

text.en-trans: yermé ngak gi wangchuk ledrel tsal

text.en: Ösal Rinchen Nyingpo, to you I pray:
Inspire me always with your blessings,
text.en-trans: taktu dak la jingyi lob pa dang

text.en: Purify my faults and impairments and breakages of samaya,
text.en-trans: damtsik nyamchak nyepa kün jang zhing

text.en: Transfer all your wisdom realization directly into my mind,
And cause me to attain the supreme vajrakāya rainbow body!
text.en-trans: jalü dorjé ku chok tobpar shok
